jmortgage.amortization
Interface PmtKey

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultPmtKey
public interface PmtKey

The payment key calculator used in an amortization map built by an implementation of FixedAmortizationBuilder. The key used in an amortization map is a Long value that represents the date that the payment is due. The Interval value represents the time between payments. Implementations of this interface provide methods to calculate the first key and to calculate subsequent keys. Calculation of subsequent keys is based on the interval value.

Since:
1.0
Author:
David Armstrong
